headline: Conventum-Alluvium Global Fund December 2024 Quarterly Report
summary: We bought two new companies during the quarter, Mastercard and Charter Communications. We now have 24 years of performance data for the MSCI World Value and Growth Indices.

headline: Diamond Hill Select Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
